metadata.synopsis: One-liners for Guard Wulf outside of the Baldurs Mouth office
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Guard Wulf outside the Baldurs Mouth offices near coords 75, 41, -57

0.speaker: Guard Wulf
0.text: I bloody SAID you looked like trouble. Could smell it a mile off.

1.speaker: Guard Wulf
1.text: Don't bother the workers out here. They're already behind on deliveries without you lot pestering them.

2.speaker: Guard Wulf
2.text: You're barred, mate. Never had to bar someone from a gazette office before - first for everything, I guess.

3.speaker: Guard Wulf
3.text: Oi, I got my eye on you. You got the look of a troublemaker.
